item.title: Sr. SW Engineer - C (mountain view)
item.description:
Direct Hire

At our company you will find yourself in a fast paced high-tech start-up environment surrounded by talented and passionate individuals. We are looking for an outstanding team player to join our software engineering team. Is this you?

We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer that will be responsible for developing product capabilities in the areas of I/O subsystem and drivers, file systems, device drivers, file data related memory management, etc.

Requirements:
5+ years of software development experiences, specifically in C development
Kernel development (prefer Linux 2.6 Kernel)
Linux OS experience
Kernel level expertise in the implementation of Linux device drivers and File systems
Heavy File systems experience
Deep understanding of Linux Kernels virtual memory, storage/file and I/O subsystems

If you are interested in this position, please respond directly to this post with your resume in Word format.

Thanks!
